definitions.definition: One who is narrow-mindedly devoted to their own ideas and groups , and intolerant of (people of) differing ideas, races , genders , religions , politics , etc.
One who is overly pious in matters of religion , often hypocritically or else superstitiously so.

main_definition: One who is narrow-mindedly devoted to their own ideas and groups , and intolerant of (people of) differing ideas, races , genders , religions , politics , etc.
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) One who is overly pious in matters of religion , often hypocritically or else superstitiously so.
